text: Mark off the width and height of the picture. Add guidelines for Ichigo’s body. Draw his head. Add a line, which will act as the center of his head.
Add guidelines for the boy’s arms, feet, hair and facial features.
Outline the shapes of the arms, legs and hair.
Outline Ichigo’s eyes, ears, fingers, trousers and sword.
Draw the rest of the clothes. Detail the shapes of Ichigo’s hair and trousers.
Work on the whole figure, paying special attention to detail.
Contour Ichigo, trying to vary the thickness and darkness of the line. Add more detail and add the ground. Erase all guidelines.r
